application.doc: Exporting a personal certificate from a certificate database

param.name: cert_id
param.doc: Name of the certificate request to export.

param.name: export
param.doc: An indication that this operation is to retrieve the entire file not just a snippet. This parameter is required

method.name: GET
method.doc: To export or retrieve a personal certificate from a certificate database with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export parameter on the SSL Certificates personal certificate resource URI. The export parameter is what differentiates the retrieve operation and the export operation. If the export parameter is included in the URL, the personal certificate is exported. If no export parameter is included in the URL, the content of the personal certificate is retrieved.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
